description:
Stretchy, breathable weather protection when moving quickly in the mountains. Combining windproof Pertex® Quantum and breathable Capilene® Cool material, the Airshed Pro blocks the chill to keep your core warm while letting heat and moisture excape. A DWR finish sheds light rain, and the 2-way zipper lets you dump heat while powerhiking. The whole thing stuffs into a sneaky hood pocket for easy packability and peace of mind on long training runs.

  • Lightweight Pertex® Quantum fabric has stretch for easy movement
  • Fabric is wind-resistant and has a DWR finish to shed moisture
  • Hood and sleeves are recycled polyester knit miDori™ bioSoft finish for softness and improved wicking
  • HeiQ anti-odour control lets you wear it more and wash it less
  • Hood fits snugly to maintain peripheral vision
  • 2-way half-length zipper provides ventilation options
  • Stash pocket in hood doubles as a stuff sack
name: Patagonia Airshed Pro Pullover - Women's
